definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: I earth mother invite you to begin to tune inward.
sentences.chinese: 我，地球母親，邀請你開始向內在調協。

sentences.english: Much like a tuning fork, the human species attunes to the thoughts of spirit.
sentences.chinese: 就象一隻音叉，人類物種調協到靈性層的思想。
